subject: VAM motors stopped working after a single day
description_text:
I bought a set of 3 VAM motors (the small ones). I finally installed 2 of
them on my rig, they worked great for about a day, then started developing
problems.

1 of them has the internal components just loose inside, 1 of them just
straight up doesn't work and the one I didn't install works just fine

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1L2F8NmKhjbo-cyBRmbARzTzeWl5YZjSj/view?usp=drivesdk

Attached is the video showing that.

Hope this can be resolved quickly, I made the purshase through Aliexpress
and will open a dispute if it's not.

Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Quan Nguyen,  Could you please check whether the vibration strength setting is set too high? For the two faulty units, we would appreciate it if you could open them and send us photos so that we can inspect the cause of the damage. In the meantime, we will arrange to send you two new VAM units. Kindly provide us with your contact name, phone number, address, and order number.Â
